Package org.apache.calcite.avatica.server

Interface MetricsAwareAvaticaHandler

All Superinterfaces:
AvaticaHandler, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Destroyable, org.eclipse.jetty.server.Handler, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.LifeCycle
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAvaticaHandler, AvaticaJsonHandler, AvaticaProtobufHandler
public interface MetricsAwareAvaticaHandler extends AvaticaHandler
An AvaticaHandler that is capable of collecting metrics.
